frameDefinitions: Through a  Message, a Speaker (sometimes encoded metonymically by a Medium) communicates the relative importance of the state of affairs denoted by the Message.
In this frame a Part is part of a larger Whole comprised of parts that are ordered.
This frame contains nouns denoting Aggregates of Individuals.
This frame concerns permanent organizations (the Institutions) that are intended to help members of the Target_group in a particular Domain with a Service_action.
An Agent, which may be an individual or group, is engaged in a complex Activity.
Words in this frame name the different parts of the calendric cycle, both man-made and natural.
frameExamples: Reid <t>emphasized</t> that he and Dean meet every month.
I sat through the first interminable <t><fex name='Part'>act</fex></t>  of the play  .
An <t><fex name='Agg'>army</fex></t> of postal workers descended on my office.
The Red Cross Tracing and Message Service is a <t>service</t> for finding and reuniting families separated by war and disaster.
The New Car Assessment <t>Program</t> (NCAP) is dedicated to helping the public buy a safer car.
Jo's mother will visit on this coming <t>Tuesday</t>.
listRoleDefinitions: The person who uses language in the written or spoken modality to convey a <fen>Message</fen> to another person.
The proposition whose denotation the Speaker presents as important.
The physical or abstract setting in which the <fen>Message</fen> is conveyed.
The time at which the <fen>Speaker</fen> communicates a <fen>Message</fen>.
The location where the <fen>Speaker</fen> delivers the <fen>Message</fen>.
This is the number of the sequence of <fen>Part</fen>s.
A part of a larger <fen>Whole</fen>.
An undivided entity having all its <fen>Part</fen>s.
This role identifies the people or things that form  the <fen>Aggregate</fen>.
This role identifies the collection of entities that are the <fen>Aggregate</fen>.
A permanent organization with a socially important purpose.
The concern of the <fen>Institution</fen>-- broadly speaking, the aspect of society that they affect.
The members of the public whom the <fen>Institution</fen> is intended to serve.
The action performed or enabled by the <fen>Institution</fen> for the <fen>Target_group</fen>.
The individual or organization that carries out the project.
An area of human endeavor, typically scientifc in nature, in which the <fen>Agent</fen>'s <fen>Activity</fen> falls.
What the <fen>Agent</fen> (an individual or the members of an organization) are dedicated to doing.
The larger aim that the <fen>Agent</fen> is pursuing by carrying out certain coordinated measures.
An entity (abstract or concrete) which is involved in an implicit <fen>Activity</fen>.
The ongoing plan of action which allows the <fen>Agent</fen> to pursue the <fen>Activity</fen>.
The time at which the <fen>Project</fen> is ongoing.
The location where a <fen>Project</fen> is pursued.
<fen>Relative_time</fen> is used for the word or words that locate the time with respect to an identifiable reference point.
<fen>Whole</fen> is used for the larger unit of which the target word names a part.
The calendric unit that is denoted. LUs in this frame all denote the <fen>Unit</fen>.
listRoleExamples: <fex>Juhl</fex> emphasized the importance of UPMC System investments, stating that their contribution to the school's funds had tripled in recent years.
He emphasized to me <fex>that my words will go down in history and that this poem has made a difference in our world</fex>.
<fex>The report</fex> emphasized that Iraq's unwillingness to cooperate represents a serious problem for the progress of this work.
However, Cockerill stressed <fex>last week</fex> that he had had many meetings about these obvious synergies and that he had pursued these aggressively.
Putin stressed <fex>in Beijing</fex> that Russia does not favor independence for Taiwan.
I sat through the <fex>first</fex> interminable <fex>act</fex> of the play .
I sat through the first interminable <fex>act</fex> of the play .
I sat through the first interminable <fex>act</fex> <fex>of the play</fex> .
A crowd <fex>of hoodlums</fex> filled the plaza.
A <fex><t>crowd</t></fex> of hoodlums filled the plaza.
At one emergency <fex>financial</fex> <fex>service</fex>, I double-checked people's math to make sure they weren't blowing the budget.
PG & E was the electric service <fex>for much of the West Coast</fex>.
Reach Out ! is a service <fex>for helping young Australians through tough times</fex>.
The <fex>DOE</fex> Human Genome Program also has developed high-throughput approaches to identifying is-regulatory sequences in the human and other genomes
Several projects <fex>in computational linguistics</fex> have recently stalled due to lack of funding .
The <fex>New Car Assessment</fex> Program (NCAP) is dedicated to helping the public buy a safer car.
The program <fex>to analyze the composition of Titan's sludge</fex> is nearly complete.
Iran has vowed to continue its <fex>nuclear</fex> program and is demanding that sanctions against it should be lifted .
Jo's mother will visit <fex> this coming</fex> Tuesday.
Jo fled in the early morning <fex>of  Sunday December 15</fex>.

the United States Department of State
